name: Need help creating dex-based Weapon Master
author: Emperor_Marius

posts.author: Emperor_Marius
posts.content:
I’m new to the game and need help in creating a build. I was thinking of a dexterity damage dealer that avoids taking damage, rather than tanking it. Attribute-wise I was thinking 15 strength, 16 dexterity, 14 constitution, 14 intelligence, 8 wisdom, 8 charisma. I was planning on primarily using Weapon Master (hence the attributes) with fighter and rouge levels thrown in. For weapons I was planning dual rapiers (I’m aware of penalties) with weapon finesse. Combat is the main focus, general utility doesn’t matter.

And for the record, I intend on going max level and playing the main story for now.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
So, you basically need Mirnaia's build, which is a human variant of Max's Drow Fencer. This doesn't have dual-wielding capabilities though but we can fix that too. Go with human & instead of taking KD/ IKD spend those three feats (one is bonus from being human) to take "ambidexterity, two-weapon fighting & Improved two-weapon fighting". Your AB will take a serious hit worth of five points, going from an "AB of 47 to 42" with all penalties from dual-wielding medium weapons & changing the race to human, but it won't matter in the long run because it was excessive anyway & the monsters in most modules (especially in OC) are relatively easy to hit.

Here is a link to the original build,

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Here is a build I made in 2015 and tweaked now because I am always learning and getting better at building. It is close to what you requested, but uses rapier-and-shield. Dual-wielding would not only cost you shield AC and attack penalties, but also Knockdown / IKD and Improved Critical, too costly. This build should do well in the OC followed by the Mines of Twin Summit series (link to thread), which will take you all the way to level 40.
